title: Communicate With Your Spirit Guide 📖 ✨ Guided Meditation ❤️
description:
Welcome to the guided meditation on connecting with your spirit guide. In this meditation, you will be guided to open up the channels of communication and strengthen the bond between you and your spiritual guide. Take a few moments to relax and create a peaceful space for yourself. As you listen to the soothing music and gentle guidance, allow yourself to let go of any distractions and focus on the present moment. Through this meditation, you will learn to trust your intuition, receive guidance and support from your spirit guide, and deepen your spiritual connection. Join me on this transformative journey and start communicating with your spirit guide today. Remember to subscribe to our channel for more guided meditations and spiritual content. Thank you for tuning in! 🙌✨ 

Download Pura Rasa Meditation App:

Apple Link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/pura-rasa/id1665649108?platform=iphone

#spiritguide #guidedmeditation #meditation #spiritual #trustyourintuition

channelDescription:
Welcome to the channel, beautiful soul 💛

This is a safe space where you will find various types of meditations; ranging from physical healing, sleep aid, law of attraction, deep relaxation, meditations to help strengthen your sixth sense and more. You will also find music, sounds of nature for sleep, relaxation and for your personal meditations. 

By using this meditation library you will find your centre, quiet your thoughts, relax deeply and feel grounded. This is the space where you will delve deeper into your subconscious to achieve lasting results. 

Through regular video uploads, I will provide you with as many effective tools as possible to live peacefully in the modern world.

Subscribe and I will meet you in the next meditation!

With appreciation,
Rasa
